data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LksNw2VyGNsQ7kNvgF2P1L8&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCfYwbegIBh-KFKv9wF0LFBtXGDL2U7DE5NdnPnoIjvoQ&oe=665DA99C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=afM56ntN1iEQ7kNvgEvEv4e&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCiaF41yhf17Z26_nTYBytOp5KLwPMLJWSRQbJsMIyS9Q&oe=665DB324)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BrPGHgLXrgEQ7kNvgHoRvoO&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBCCHIjd6k_K4qASde_iyckxPaxLkB4iECh5VPt5PUlDA&oe=665D9A87)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DXov9V5AsCQQ7kNvgE0SLzI&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAOnxUkT4dLiSDU594-QJVMMlYM9H9sp_xU47qo9HDztA&oe=665D8D66)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=zZ2HFKOcY54Q7kNvgE83de7&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCbFLCWQj92JOtagaygFAbuC0skTM2zGinqmVrxFzSfAg&oe=665DB9D8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=YUxsIInYzsYQ7kNvgGsCFY4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDXYYYNPeG5oFCiRz4YVt_thTSSt7aJD7Q-k1hGu24OBw&oe=665DB659)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Q71wNG5FNhcQ7kNvgHfqDyy&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA3LUFBGHoiIjEyY1FViYWrY0cJAMS-Da2oQ-Fa-8H9nQ&oe=665D9C70)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gkKG71mngrsQ7kNvgE3MYLW&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC_i-Y_Qu6wuI_lPwQSdh5wCkjISHU7XBUE3YseP4vYoQ&oe=665D86EA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Dicz_RDYBmoQ7kNvgHIsLZv&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCOktFgLvayLVLISmUfKuWFmVOJ5pBGSeblx74ZWLPoVw&oe=665D9A97)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=hyw0FNQFBh0Q7kNvgGbzvjF&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAICwKgIAYhZUHKaBrAbQVmB_0Z_aIoFTnF3gGcYaRAyA&oe=665DB60C)
